register.title: AnamCon - Registration
register.name: First Name
register.terms_checkbox: I have read and accept the
register.mandatory_fields_errors: * There are mandatory fields not filled out in the form.
register.mandatory_input_errors: ** There are errors in the form.
register.accept_terms_error: *** You must accept the terms and conditions to register.

js_consts.username_error_text: The username must be available and contain between 5 and 30 characters, excluding special characters and spaces (Only '_' and '.' allowed). **

password_error_text.password_error_text_invalid: The password is not valid. It must contain a combination of at least 8 and no more than 60 characters, including at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number. **

email_error_text.email_error_pattern: The entered value does not match a valid email. **

register_success.title: AnamCon - Log In
register_success.description_1: The registration has been successfully completed.
register_success.description_2: You will receive a confirmation email in the next few minutes.
register_success.description_3: You can now access the system by logging in with your credentials.

terms.title: AnamCon - Terms
terms.term_0: Welcome to AnamCon, an open, automated, and customizable web-based anamnesis system. By accessing and using AnamCon, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions:
terms.term_2: AnamCon is an anamnesis system developed for academic purposes. It has not yet been clinically tested or validated and should not be currently used for medical purposes. The user assumes all responsibility arising from the use of this software for medical purposes.
terms.term_4: AnamCon is distributed freely under the terms of the MIT License. You can download the complete project on Github through the link at the end of this document. The logo have been specifically designed for this project and is property of AnamCon. The main logo and logotype include the Project Space font under the SIL Open Font License (OFL) Version 1.1. This project uses the python Flask framework under the BSD license, and the python Dialogflow and Dialogflow_v2 libraries under the Apache License Version 2.0. You can find all the details and complete licenses in the project files.
terms.term_6: AnamCon is provided 'as is' without any warranties of any kind. The accuracy and reliability of the system are not guaranteed. In no event shall the author be liable for damages or consequences, direct or indirect, arising from the use of this software.
terms.term_8: The use of AnamCon and its derivatives must be responsible and comply with applicable laws and regulations. The use of this software for the purpose of harming, discriminating, or injuring individuals or groups is expressly prohibited.
terms.term_10: These terms may change at any time. The user is responsible for periodically reviewing them.
terms.term_11: By using AnamCon, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and accepted these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, please refrain from using AnamCon and delete any copies of the software.

anamnesis.title: AnamCon - Anamnesis
anamnesis.delete_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to delete this medical history?
anamnesis.start_anamnesis_text_2: Before proceeding, please take a moment to review the terms of use:
anamnesis.start_anamnesis_text_4: Total time for medical history is unlimited.
anamnesis.start_anamnesis_text_6: You can cancel any interaction by indicating "there has been an error".
anamnesis.start_anamnesis_text_7: Immediate report upon completion of medical history.
anamnesis.start_anamnesis_text_8: Usage analytics upon completion of medical history.
anamnesis.start_anamnesis_text_9: By continuing, you accept all terms and conditions of use.
anamnesis.no_anamnesis_main_text: You must select a medical history.
